website_summaries.verdict: The natural bamboo and sleek design make this one of the more attractive choices for revolving bookcases.
pros: A unique way to display your books
Assembly is easy, with required hardware included
cons: Some customers received split bamboo pieces

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why other reviewers mentioned this rotating book case is "black" when it is made of light brown bamboo wood, and why someone mentions "plastic," of which there is none. Maybe they're referring to other products. But this rotating book case is fantastic, easy to put together, and nicely stores books that do not fit into already-full wall book shelves. I packed mine full of books, and it rotates well. I would be careful if I had little kids, who could easily push it over. But I plan to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: gene

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together. A little bit awkward for what I am using it for. It appears much bigger and more useful in the picture. It must have miniature books on it, because it can’t hardly be used to hold general sized kids books. There were a few places where the bamboo was split and other places it was coming apart where it had been glued/sealed. All in all, we will get use out of it...just not what I had intended. Bamboo is sustainable, so that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Wenry

customer_reviews.title: Unique revolving bookshelf.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy attractive bookshelf. The revolving feature allows for additional storage space. Easy to assemble. My 11 year old niece and nephew put it together without assistance.
customer_reviews.author: RAY

customer_reviews.title: Rotating Bookcase Holds Plenty!
customer_reviews.text: We love this compact bookcase! It tucks nicely into the corner, rotates smoothly, and holds plenty of my daughter’s books/nicnacs. It was easily assembled in less than an hour and is perfect for her small space!
customer_reviews.author: kmom8

customer_reviews.title: Put a little stronger adhesive on the screw hole covers
customer_reviews.text: Finally a good looking sturdy DVD rack it takes up so much less space and has quality built. The only thing I didn’t like was putting the Rods inside and then the movies don’t square up when they are put in the holder the kind of Come out at an angle so the first DVD fits nicely and the last DVD sticks out a quarter Inch or more but if you can deal with that it is heavy duty and looks good
customer_reviews.author: Dean T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product very poor instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and sturdy product. The build instructions are very poorly written. Take note of the holes for the book divider pegs before assembling. Note that even with the shelves placed as far apart as possible, there is not room for a 3-ring binder. Also, the stickers used to cover the screw heads peel off by themselves. A bit of glue fixes this. Would give 5 stars if it had better assembly instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can fit larger books if you remove one or both rods
customer_reviews.text: PACKING: Great. No qualms. ASSEMBLY: Step 1 did not clarify in the image the orientation of the four sides. There's one extra small hole on one side of the board that must be in the center facing inside for the rods. Step 2's image of the base was different from the base we got, but we eventually found the pinprick holes for the screws on one side. --- FINAL PRODUCT: - super utilization of space - rotates well, seems sturdy - different levels are slightly different heights, allowing larger books - you can remove one or both rods in the center to accommodate "deeper" books - superior, in my opinion, to a one-faced bookshelf to maximize space
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rotating foundation and surprisingly strong construction!
customer_reviews.text: Bamboo is superior in strength to the usual materials used in assembly style furniture. The assembly process for this bookshelf couldn't be simpler providing a stable end product. The rotating base is silent and operates smoothly with no wobble. I'm using the bookshelf in my 5th wheel RV because of the small footprint and it is working very well. The design allows a wide selection of shelf spacing to accommodate even large books and literature storage/file boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Minihan

customer_reviews.title: Good overall, reduces footprint in tight area
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit. The wood grain adhesive paper was not precut for circles to cover screw heads as advertised. Just a sheet. At least for my use, the screws don't need covered anyway. Didn't especially like the bamboo cross pieces that are pictured holding things in place. They go mostly at a diagonal l and do not evenly support the back of things shelved. They function, but not neatly. Went together well. Stand is solid, I placed heavier items at bottom, of course. Very useful in my bedroom office as I can keep items at hand yet not take up floor space with a shelf unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ronh

customer_reviews.title: Nice bookshelf, but definitely doesn’t hold 300 DVDs
customer_reviews.text: Nice bookshelf, but definitely doesn’t hold 300 DVDs. Also it has started to crack. I have been hearing some popping sounds and couldn’t figure out what it was and then I realized, it was the bookshelf. It has not been cracking where the screws are (which are not the best quality as two broke in the process of putting it together,) but in the middle of the shelves. I am atributing this to poor quality and that the room I have it in is on the colder side. (There is no way that they are cracking under the weight of the DVDs.)
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon P.

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful to NOT overtighten the screws. As soon as the screw heads were flush with the wood, I stopped tightening them. No broken screws, no cracked boards. This is holding dvds, not lead weights - the screws don't need to be super tight. Then again, maybe I just got lucky a received a good one? Overall, though, I'm quite happy with the shelf & will definitely buy another if/when my collection outgrows a single shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Nice solution to holding a lot of media in a small footprint.
customer_reviews.text: It is as described and not too difficult to assemble. Be careful to make sure you have the ends oriented per the instructions as you go or you can get a vertical panel in the opposite direction: shelves go together as you assemble, but don't ultimately line up up at the end. Other issue is sunken holes for the fasteners are covered by adhesive-backed stickers with matching wood-grain which tend to peel. But it's a good display overall.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The wood is of higher quality and is a beautiful piece of furniture. I have bamboo floors and this really compliments them! I would however put a sticker on the sides indicating which was top as I had to take it apart. Considering purchasing another for the basement.
customer_reviews.author: mzm6030

customer_reviews.title: NO instructions or directions provided
customer_reviews.text: I just got around to assembling this after having ordered it back in December. First thing I realized is that there were no instructions provided which, given how intricate the bookcase is, is a serious omission. Second, one of the panels was cracked — the wood was split. Lastly, the product came with two types of screws, some that required a Allen wrench and some a Phillips screwdriver, but nowhere does it say which to use where. Product is attractive but that's about all I can say that is positive.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: This is almost perfect product.
customer_reviews.text: It's advertised for DVDs, CDs, and Books, but if we used for CD's and DVDs, we need at least 1 or 2 shelves more. That's is the only thing it's not perfect. Otherwise, this is a great product, light and study, unlike cheap and heavy particle board or even stronger than plywood.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Ly

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold as many dvds as hoped, but still good space saver
customer_reviews.text: The description states it will hold up to 300 dvd's, but in another part of the description it states it depends on packaging size. So in reality it holds about 220 dvd's. A little disappointed that it didn't hold more. It does fit conveniently into a small corner, so excellent space saver. The instructions are close to worthless so just make sure that the holes for the rods are in the right spot before screwing everything down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great storage in little space
customer_reviews.text: love my rotating book carousel. it holds so many books! I must have 100 on it. easy to assemble and looks great. got it fast in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jan E. Stetson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit of time to put together, but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: SGen

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy workmanship and cheap metal screws.
customer_reviews.text: Many of the predrilled holes were not drilled deep enough. Screws were cheap pop metal and 3 broke off while being screwed and could not be taken out. The instructions DO NOT how the interior holes for the divider sticks needed be aligned so I had to take several panels off and reinstall them.
customer_reviews.author: G. Zohoranacky

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if it was cut properly at factory
customer_reviews.text: Some of the pieces were cut much too long and would not go together without being forced into place. It rotates nice but in the end, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Rich D.

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver bookshelf, great price
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful, compact bookshelf. Put together by myself and did well. Holds all but 12 oversize books collection. High quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Holds many books close at hand next to couch
customer_reviews.text: A good product that has stood up for over a year now. Only problems are that it's not taller allowing for another level or two AND niches won't hold my taller books.
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year for my books. I stained it a darker color and it is still holding up great. Assembly was easy, I only broke one screw but that was mostly my fault. Overall, it is a great product. I have filled the first one I bought, so will be purchasing another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Frida A Meraz

customer_reviews.title: no assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: It came with NO assembly instructions at all. There is no way to even know whether I have all parts. E-mail to company not returned. A listed phone number is not valid. A pile of parts in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I love it! it was easy to assemble, and so convenient
customer_reviews.author: Julie Overton

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Very stylish, pretty. Holds a lot of books.
customer_reviews.author: B><H>

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions were not very clear. The overall construction is very flimsy and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: alp

customer_reviews.title: Exactly how it looks in the picture
customer_reviews.text: My son assembled this without any problems. Holds more than you might think.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Quite easy to assemble, very nice & sturdy piece! I want another one!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kelly

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't come with instructions
customer_reviews.text: Really just like it. Does exactly what we needed to do it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: gregory fifield

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and service
customer_reviews.text: We received our bookshelf. It was very simple to put together and sturdy. We noticed as we put it together that one side panel was cracked vertically. We contacted the seller to let them know and they responded very quickly and replaced the whole item. We’re very pleased with the product and service. The shelf fits a surprising amount of books but is not an overwhelming piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but box was beaten and one small part broken
customer_reviews.text: Amazing but box was beaten and one small part broken, aside from a small piece being broken its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, easy construction
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sturdy, easy construction, and a nice design. Remarkably fast shipping speed.
customer_reviews.author: Xiao Dong

product_meta.title: Clevr 5 Tier 57.5" Natural Bamboo Bookshelf Revolving Bookcase,100% Natural Bamboo, 360 Rotating Organizer Cabinet Rack, Holds Up to 300 DVD's or Books, Spinning Design, Removable Adjustable Divider
feature_bullets: 5 Tier, 360 Rotating Design, Overall size 57.5" x 14.5" x 14.5", Inside Shelf Dimension: 55" x 13" x 13"
Sleek, Clean Design, Stylish and convenient. Holds about 300 DVD's (depends on packaging)
Made of 100% Natural Bamboo, durable and elegant
Wipe clean using a damp cloth and a mild cleaner. Wipe dry with a clean cloth

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
